Label: Obligation
Bounding Box: Mandatory - used in GeoBlacklight software to provide more relevant search results

Label: Purpose
Bounding Box: To support overlap ratio boosting in spatial searches.

Label: Entry Guidelines
Bounding Box: This should be a bounding box in this format: ENVELOPE(W,E,N,S).

Label: Commentary
Bounding Box: If the [Geometry](../ogm-aardvark/#geometry) field uses the ENVELOPE syntax, then these fields will be identical.
